external_references.description: Glyer, C, et al. (2020, March). This Is Not a Test: APT41 Initiates Global Intrusion Campaign Using Multiple Exploits. Retrieved April 28, 2020.
Nikita Rostovcev. (2022, August 18). APT41 World Tour 2021 on a tight schedule. Retrieved February 22, 2024.

objects.description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) exploited CVE-2020-10189 against Zoho ManageEngine Desktop Central through unsafe deserialization, and CVE-2019-19781 to compromise Citrix Application Delivery Controllers (ADC) and gateway devices.(Citation: FireEye APT41 March 2020) [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) leveraged vulnerabilities such as ProxyLogon exploitation or SQL injection for initial access.(Citation: Rostovcev APT41 2021)
